# parentIndex

**Instance Property**

The index of this joint’s parent, or nil if this joint has no parent.

## Declaration

```swift
var parentIndex: Int?
```

## Discussion

If the joint has a parent, the index of the parent needs to be lower than that of the child.
title: parentIndex
